Curious ...

I've just discovered (much to my chagrin during a demonstration of my Awesome Rocket of Lag) that Alt(Right)+L does not lock the stage. Only Alt(Left)+L does. I've performed the death-defying (enhancing) deed twice now. I'm not sure whether or not to submit this as a bug, or if something has just gone Kerbal with my installation, or if I just need another "How-To" refresher course in the Science of Rocketry.

Can someone enlighten me on this? Or confirm one way or another?

On my PC, this was never a problem. I almost always did the Alt(L)+L combo. On my laptop, I tend to ALT®+combo-key in most other programs (a character quirk of mine, so sue me ).

It is neither a bug, nor a problem with your installation. It's quite common for sim-type games (be they flight sims or whatnot) to require different bindings for left and right Alt keys. They are registered separately.
